name: INTESTINES
V: Dry, peristalsis disorders, distention, gas, constipation
P: Profuse secretions, quick peristalsis, inflammation, ulceration, abscess, tumors, cancer, bleeding, perforation
K: Mucus coating, slow peristalsis, obstruction, distention, edema, tumors
desc: Intestinal gas and irregular movements relate to Vata. Inflammation and bleeding relates to Pitta. Heaviness, congestion and phlegm relates to Kapha.
